name: order-system
description: A Node.js starter for the Serverless Framework with async/await and unit test support

scripts.integration-test: env TEST_MODE=handler ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --require babel-polyfill --require babel-register tests/test_cases --reporter spec --retries 3 --timeout 10000
scripts.acceptance-test: env TEST_MODE=http TEST_ROOT=https://4w00onoqzb.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/dev ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --require babel-polyfill --require babel-register tests/test_cases --reporter spec --retries 3 --timeout 10000
